ModMetaData.name: Thal's Tweaks
ModMetaData.author: Thalassicuis
ModMetaData.description:
A variety of small quality of life adjustments and balance changes to make the game more fun.
• Reorganized item categories to make it easier to create stockpiles. - "Edible" items include food, drugs, and corpses. - "Indoor" items deteriorate, but are not edible. - "Outdoor" items do not deteriorate. - Moved mortar shells to weapons category. • Cats and wargs don't make constant noises. • Animals haul more often. • Sleep can be disturbed up to 10 times, making private rooms more desirable. • Wind turbines can be built on open water. • Hospital beds are cleaner than regular beds. • Combat traders sell turrets (anything based on Building_TurretGun). • Uranium is available from bulk good ships.
